dialog.title: System Architecture Overview
dialog.description: High-level choices for stack, infrastructure, data, and alignment.

points.0: Frontend: Vue.js + Vite with shadcn/vue for professional, accessible UI.
points.1: Backend: FastAPI with Uvicorn focused on performance and async.
points.2: Reverse Proxy: Nginx routing /api to FastAPI.

points.0: Full Infrastructure-as-Code with Terraform (VPC, ECS, Route 53, ACM, CloudFront).
points.1: CI/CD automation with GitHub Actions and Pytest validation.
points.2: High-performance FastAPI backend with parallel Monte Carlo workers.
points.3: Secure frontend deployment on CloudFront with HTTPS and Cognito Auth.
points.4: Centralized monitoring and logging via CloudWatch.
points.5: Robust IAM, OAuth2, and JWT-based security model.
points.6: Designed for scalability, maintainability, and production resilience.
points.7: VPC with private subnets for enhanced security and isolation.

points.0: Database: PostgreSQL 16 for robust data persistence.
points.1: Comprehensive testing suite with Pytest for API and unit tests.
points.2: Asynchronous Monte Carlo workers for parallel simulations.

points.0: System Design: Path from single EC2 to cloud-native (ECS, RDS, ALB).
points.1: Technical Expertise: Clean Architecture and DDD reflected in API and data design.
points.2: High-Performance/Fintech: FastAPI + Redis/Rust roadmap fit financial workloads.
